name: Fiend Blaster: Robot Journey
description:
You're a robot, sent from the future to the medieval ages to fight terrible monsters and demons that are trying to change the course of history! Destroy them with several weapon types before they rewrite history! Be careful, though, because ammo is limited and it's quite dark!

Features include:
- Survival game mode (Endless waves of progressively-difficult enemies)
- Waypoint game mode (Timed-based  scavenger hunt)
- Online high scores for both!
- Cool-ish and unique-ish artstyle
- 4 weapons and 5 enemy types

Created for the DSOP Cartridge Jam #3

Controls:
Left Mouse Button - Fire Weapon
Mouse - Look Around
WASD - Walk
Shift - Run
Space - Jump/Climb

Credits:

crait - Programming, design, gameplay

Lowlande52 - Modeling, animation, programming

Greycove - Music, pixel art
